title: FS: T215-2 Red Cross Warhop - SOLD!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: T215-2 Red Cross Warhop - SOLD!
posts.post_content: My ticket for the Colts-Ravens playoff game cost me $165; trying to get it back with this "beauty."  Will consider offers including partial trade for other items I collect.
Good luck with the sale Erick. We'll be waiting for you next weekend in New England (assuming the Bengals win as I expect them to)!
One offer in; card will be sold tonight!  LMK if you are interested... Just watching football for the next five hours.

[quote name="t206hound" post=1069904]One offer in; card will be sold tonight!  LMK if you are interested... Just watching football for the next five hours.[/QUOTE]

Your next post will be your thousandth, use it wisely:)
